revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA2700 |revision= |upc=745883595341 |ean=4260184661152 |asin=B007IL72CI |est_release_date=03/09/2012 |fcc_date=02/08/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=SAB301 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA2700 |ic_id=3839A-EA2700 |pcb_id=48SAB301.SGE |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47186B0 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U518S2CTR-BC |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU5162ETR-E3C |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47186B0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43236 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B |oui_eth=20:AA:4B }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band N600 Router with Gigabit}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA2700}}
"48SAB301.SGE" and "2011/12/09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA14567 WiFi Certified]
The FCC test report also lists the RAM and Flash as.. *Flash - '''Hynix''' H27U518S2CTR-BC (64MB), :alternately '''Micron''' NAND512W3A2SN6F (64MB) *RAM - '''Hynix''' H5DU5162ETR-E3C (64MB), :alternately '''EtronTech''' EM6AB160TSD-5G (64MB)
<small>The FCC test report contradicts itself by stating the router as a 'Dual-Band N600 Router with Gigabit', stating the device has 2 completed receivers and transmitters, and then stating the router supports speeds up to 450Mbps.</small>
===Links=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31738-cisco-linksys-ea2700-gigabit-dual-band-wireless-n600-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] â€¢ [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31742-cisco-linksys-ea2700-retest Retest] *[https://superevr.com/blog/2013/dont-use-linksys-routers/ ''Don't use Linksys Routers'' on '''Superevr''']
*{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_EA2700}} *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=153481 Linksys Cisco EA2700 Serial Dump/CFE on '''DD-WRT''' forums]
*[http://kb.linksys.com/Linksys/GetArticle.aspx?docid=b4b7d9b19ec240019eb7fed6d2399fbc_EA2700_Frequently_Asked_Questions.xml&pid=94 ''Linksys EA2700 FAQ'' on '''Linksys''' site] :The default SSID pattern is noted as '''CiscoXXXXX''' *[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 20:AA:4B OUI]
